author: ate
msg: Correct location of Jetspeed-2 schemas on the web.
Note: this migration guide actually pointed at the current location http://portals.apache.org/jetspeed-2/2.1/schema/,
but actual usage throughout our codebase (jetspeed-portlet.xml, *.psml etc.) refers to http://portals.apache.org/jetspeed-2/2.1/schemas/
So, besides changing this document, I've actually moved the schema folder on the site to the schemas folder.
